info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 26 at 7:18PM MDT until August 26 at 9:15PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of south central New Mexico, including the following county, Dona Ana.
* WHEN...Until 915 PM MDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Dangerous flows over low-water crossings. Water over roadways.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 718 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in low water crossing on highway 185, south of Rincon. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Low water crossing on highway 185 are the most likely place to experience minor flooding. Additional rainfall of up to 0.5 inches is expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Peaceful Valley and Rinconcito. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM MDT THIS EVENING
